markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />command ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per round;  **Requirements** You can see your nemesis, and they're within 30 feet of you; **Effect** You focus your hatred into a mental scream. Your nemesis takes 3d6 mental damage, which they can resist with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) DC 26 Will save. You take half as much damage as your nemesis does, and you can't reduce this damage in any way.
